short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to see the remix tree to any Scratch project

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scratch has a hidden feature on any project where you can see a tree of the remixed projects of one project, and then the remixes of the remixes, which then forms a big tree.
